external_games.name: Train Simulator: North London & Goblin Lines Add-On

name: Train Simulator 2021: North London & Goblin Lines
summary: Stretching across North and East London, the Gospel Oak to Barking Line - affectionately known as the ‘GOBLIN’ - has grown into a major part of the extensive London Overground network; a network which has specialized in re-vitalizing neglected routes throughout the Capital, converting them into railways which are fit to serve modern-day.
